forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 17C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 63F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 13C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 57F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain likely. Low 12C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain likely. Low 53F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies later at night. Low 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 15C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 61F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial clearing expected late. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later at night. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 64F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 19C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 67F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 51F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 63F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the morning, becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
